name: Spicy Margarita
preparation:
While the rest of humanity sucks back sickly sweet blender bombs this Cinco de Mayo, find your way to a more serious drink. Muddled jalapeño adds a spicy edge to the baked agave flavors of reposado tequila for a Margarita that’s fit for the fifth of May—or any other day of the year.

At the bottom of a cocktail shaker, muddle the jalapeño coins with agave syrup.

Pour the remaining ingredients into shaker, fill with ice, and shake until chilled.

Strain into a salt-rimmed rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a lime wedge.
